channel.title: Need help with Max Item Amount - Deltascape Source
channel.description:
Alright, I've tried a few different tuts and searches, but to no avail, I can't figure out how to change my maximum item amount in Deltascape Source. If someone could help me, please? This is the code here:
[code] public int maxItemAmount = /* 2000000000 */999999999;[/code]
I know this is a noobie question, sorry, but thanks for any help.
Clay.

item.title: Need help with Max Item Amount - Deltascape Source

item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Yep but I saw why it didn’t work, worked now. Thanks man.
